properties.name: app-region
properties.description: Electron-specific CSS property that defines draggable regions in custom title bar windows. Setting 'drag' marks a rectangular area as draggable for moving the window; 'no-drag' excludes areas from the draggable region.

values.name: drag
values.description: Marks the element as draggable for moving the Electron window

values.name: no-drag
values.description: Excludes the element from being used to drag the Electron window

properties.name: speak
properties.description: Deprecated CSS2 aural stylesheet property for controlling screen reader speech. Use ARIA attributes instead.

values.name: auto
values.description: Content is read aurally if element is not a block and is visible

values.name: never
values.description: Content will not be read aurally

values.name: always
values.description: Content will be read aurally regardless of display settings
